meanings.definition: In a spirited and determined manner.
meanings.sent1: She ran feistily towards the finish line, determined to win the race.
meanings.sent2: The young puppy played feistily with its favorite toy, full of energy.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel chattered feistily at the birds, trying to join their conversation.
meanings.sent4: The flames danced feistily in the fireplace, casting a warm glow.
meanings.sent5: The wind howled feistily through the trees, creating an eerie sound.

meanings.definition: Showing a lively and energetic attitude.
meanings.sent1: The feistily little girl skipped down the street, full of energy.
meanings.sent2: The team played feistily, determined to win the game.
meanings.sent3: The feistily colored flowers brightened up the garden with their vibrant hues.
meanings.sent4: The feistily decorated room was filled with lively patterns and colors.
meanings.sent5: Her feistily painted artwork captured the attention of everyone in the gallery.
